summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road with buildings on the right side. At 6.0s, a young child in red pants suddenly appears from behind a building on the right side and runs across the road, creating a potential collision situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle needs to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision with the child who suddenly appeared from behind the building on the right side and ran across the road.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A young child in red pants, approximately 2 meters away, running across the road from behind a building, causing a potential collision situation.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road with buildings on both sides. A motorcyclist is seen on the right side of the road, stationary and partially obstructed by a building.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed and direction, as there are no immediate obstacles or vehicles in its path.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A motorcyclist, approximately 2 meters away, stationary and partially obstructed by a building.
